alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Carroll; Crawford; Greene; Pocahontas; Sac; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 12:23PM CDT until September 23 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Greene County in west central Iowa... Northwestern Webster County in central Iowa... Southern Pocahontas County in northwestern Iowa... Sac County in west central Iowa... Calhoun County in west central Iowa... Eastern Crawford County in west central Iowa... Carroll County in west central Iowa... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1223 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nemaha to near Breda to near Manilla, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carroll, Sac City, Rockwell City, Lake City, Manson, Manning, Coon Rapids, Glidden, Lake View, Odebolt, Black Hawk Lake, North Twin Lake, South Twin Lake, Wall Lake, Manilla, Pomeroy, Fonda, Early, Gilmore City, and Arcadia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Carroll; Crawford; Greene; Pocahontas; Sac; Webster
